Answer.description: Each Answer is associated with a Question and belongs to a ConsultationResponse.

multiple_choice.description: Responses to the multiple choice part of the question, if any
multiple_choice.title: Multiple Choice

free_text.description: The answer to the free text part of the question, if any
examples: I don't think this is a good idea at all
I would like to point out a few things
I would like clarification on a few key points
free_text.title: Free Text

Answer.title: Answer

description: A ConsultationResponse groups answers. For now it is also a placeholder for response-level information such as demographics, responding-in-the-capacity-of, etc.

submission_date.description: The submission date of the response
submission_date.title: Submission Date

title: ConsultationResponse
